title: Identify the Purpose
text: Flow visualization diagrams are used to represent movement or transfer.

title: Focus on Movement
text: The primary focus of flow visualization is on the movement between stages or entities.

title: Consider the Elements
text: Flow visualizations often involve data, resources, or information, but are not created to see the number of data points.

title: Exclude Other Options
text: Flow visualizations do not show hierarchical structures or 2D structures, and are only a singular level for the processes.
